thread.section_title: StockWiseAuto.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StockWiseAuto.com | stockwiseauto.com | 10 of 257
thread.title: Walt

author: Walt
title: Walt
text: I ordered a part to fix my 4x4 truck before the weather turned cold and a snow storm hit our area. When it arrived, it had been damaged during shipping. I contacted StockWise Customer Service who immediately sent out another part to replace the broken one, It arrived a just a couple of days in time for me to install it before the storm. A big "Thank You" to the staff at StockWiseAuto to help me out of a jam. You have made a customer for life.
